name: K3NG-Keyer for AVR-Studio 6

screenshots.caption: Vero-board containts an ATMega1284P @16Mhz, using TIL196 Quad Optocoupler
Display response message at keyer startup

short_description:
The K3NG Morse Keyer based upon the native Arduino hardware. The entire project is moved to an Atmel-Studio 6 project and AVR-GCC compilers depricated functions where updated so the project can be
re-compile and debugged with an JTAGICE under ATMEL-Studio 6 on a different hardware as Arduino. 
The major advantage is the professional IDE with all features of them to make the code more readable because it's now possible to splitt the single Arduino File into a couple of functional sepperated source files. 
Many thanks to K3NG who maintain his keyer code and the free availibility, that's not to be taken for granted.
A detailed description and discussion of that project where found at  http://radioartisan.wordpress.com/arduino-cw-keyer and the related Yahoo Group at  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/radioartisan/

I have decide me to stop the code porting for public, so everyone who needs the code, can use this Project as  a template. Latest is K3NG Keyer 2013042202
vy 73 de DD4DA
